data.eml:eml: Additions to the Tanaidomorpha (Crustacea: Tanaidacea) from mud volcanoes and coral mounds of the Gulf of Cadiz and Horseshoe Continental Rise

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Esquete, Patricia, Cunha, Marina R. (2018): Additions to the Tanaidomorpha (Crustacea: Tanaidacea) from mud volcanoes and coral mounds of the Gulf of Cadiz and Horseshoe Continental Rise. Zootaxa 4377 (4): 517-541, DOI: https://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4377.4.3
